trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> or a similar control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor do componente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"> </xref> objetos num <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> ou um controlo semelhante.

trans-unit.source: The HotSpotCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> object that is embedded in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> or a similar control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de HotSpotCollectionEditor fornece uma interface de utilizador para editar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>elementos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>objeto que está incorporado um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>ou um controlo semelhante.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The HotSpotCollectionEditor is invoked by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **HotSpots** property in the visual designer's **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: O HotSpotCollectionEditor é invocado selecionando o botão de reticências (**... **) no **HotSpots** propriedade no estruturador visual **propriedades** grelha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>método devolve sempre `false` para indicar que apenas um objeto pode ser selecionado um momento no editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> method returns an array of types that the editor can create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>método devolve uma matriz de tipos que pode criar o editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A> property returns the name of the Help topic that the editor displays.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A>propriedade devolve o nome do tópico de ajuda que apresenta o editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> class when you select the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **HotSpots** property in the visual designer's **Properties** grid, when designing an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or other control that encapsulates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework constrói internamente uma nova instância da classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>ao selecionar o botão de reticências (**... **) no **HotSpots** propriedade no estruturador visual **propriedades** grelha, ao conceber uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controlo ou outro controlo que encapsula uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The type of the collection to edit.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da coleção para editar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether multiple <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> collection elements can be selected at one time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se vários <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> elementos da coleção podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: The CanSelectMultipleInstances method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> object.
trans-unit.target: O método de CanSelectMultipleInstances sempre devolve `false`; assim, apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objeto pode ser selecionado um dado momento a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Gets the multiple data types that the collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os vários tipos de dados que pode criar o editor de colecções.

trans-unit.source: The types that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> object can create are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot>, and others that can be derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> class.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos de que o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>pode criar o objeto são <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot>e outras pessoas que pode ser derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A type array of the data types the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> can create.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipo dos tipos de dados a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"> </xref> pode criar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help topic to display for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tópico de ajuda a apresentar para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The HelpTopic property gets the name of the Help topic to display when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> dialog box **Help** button is clicked or when the **F1** key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade HelpTopic obtém o nome do tópico ajuda a apresentar quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>caixa de diálogo **ajudar** botão é clicado ou quando o **F1** tecla é premida.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the Help topic to display.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que especifica o tópico de ajuda para apresentar.
